conversation_tests.name: basic-booking
conversation_tests.caller_prompt: You are calling La Bella Vita restaurant to book a table for 4 people this Thursday at 7pm. Your name is Sarah Chen. Be natural and conversational.
eval: Did the agent confirm the booking with a confirmation number or ID?
Did the agent confirm the correct date (Thursday), time (7pm), and party size (4)?
Did the agent ask for the caller's name?
tool_call_eval: Was the book_table tool called with party_size=4?
Was the book_table tool called with the name 'Sarah Chen' or similar?

conversation_tests.name: availability-check
conversation_tests.caller_prompt: You want to check if La Bella Vita has availability for a large party of 12 this Saturday at 8pm. If available, go ahead and book it under the name 'Johnson'.
eval: Did the agent check availability before booking?
Did the agent handle the large party size appropriately?
Was the conversation natural and not robotic?
tool_call_eval: Was book_table called after availability was confirmed?

conversation_tests.name: menu-question
conversation_tests.caller_prompt: You're calling to ask about the menu. You're vegetarian and want to know what options they have. You're not ready to book yet.
eval: Did the agent provide information about vegetarian options?
Did the agent NOT force a booking when the caller said they weren't ready?
Was the agent helpful and friendly?
